dove crochet pullover pattern - easy cuff-to-cuff crochet construction

this pattern is included in the [just two seams collection][1]


crafted with a unique approach, this pattern promises to elevate your crochet skills while creating a stunning wardrobe essential.


**features:**

**sideways stitch showcase:** the dove pullover boasts a unique construction that begins at one arm, flows gracefully across the body, effortlessly creating a neckline, and continues to the other arm. this ingenious approach allows the stitch pattern to showcase itself sideways, resulting in long, elegant lines across the front of the sweater.

**trendy ribbing detail:** to add the perfect finishing touch, ribbing is skillfully worked around the end of the sleeves, giving you a trendy and snug cuff puff sleeve that adds flair and style to your look.

**guided diagrams:** each section of the pattern is accompanied by detailed diagrams, guiding you through every step of the process with clarity and precision.

**video tutorial:** dive into our comprehensive video tutorial, providing visual guidance and step-by-step instructions to ensure a smooth and enjoyable crafting experience.

**stitch charts:** enhance your understanding and execution of the pattern with an included stitch chart, making it easier than ever to bring your vision to life.

**size-inclusive from xs-5x**

**materials needed:**

[yarn: wecrochet swish dk weight yarn][2]
2300 (2400, 2500, 2750, 3000) (3300, 3500, 3750, 4000) yards
[crochet hook][3]: 5mm
[tapestry needle][4]
[stitch markers][5]
[scissors][6]
**level: advanced beginner**

pattern includes:
written instructions
guided diagrams
video tutorial
stitch chart
